000_prologue.title: Prologue
000_prologue.narr_text: In the ancient forest of Eldoria, you are a young mage apprentice under the tutelage of the wise Sorcerer Elwin.

001_intro.title: Chapter 1: A Mysterious Summons
001_intro.narr_text: One evening, Elwin summons you to his chamber with an urgent request. "An ancient artifact has been stolen from our vault. I need you to retrieve it," he says.

2.text: Ask for more details about the mission that was set out for you

001_accept_mission.title: Chapter 1: A Mysterious Summons
001_accept_mission.narr_text: You accept the mission without hesitation. Elwin hands you a map and a magical amulet. "The artifact was last seen near the Darkwood Grove," he says.

001_ask_details.title: Chapter 1: A Mysterious Summons
001_ask_details.narr_text: You ask Elwin for more details about the artifact. "It is a crystal of immense power, capable of controlling the elements. In the wrong hands, it could spell disaster," he explains.

001_examine_map.title: Chapter 1: A Mysterious Summons
001_examine_map.narr_text: You examine the map closely. It shows a path through the forest, leading to a marked location in Darkwood Grove. You feel a sense of foreboding as you study the map.

001_ask_dangers.title: Chapter 1: A Mysterious Summons
001_ask_dangers.narr_text: Elwin warns you, "The path to Darkwood Grove is fraught with peril. Be wary of the creatures that lurk in the shadows."

001_ask_guidance.title: Chapter 1: A Mysterious Summons
001_ask_guidance.narr_text: Elwin nods and says, "Trust in your training and the amulet I have given you. It will guide you and protect you from harm."

001_protective_spell.title: Chapter 1: A Mysterious Summons
001_protective_spell.narr_text: Elwin casts a protective spell over you. "This will shield you from minor harm. Use it wisely," he advises.

001_ask_about_amulet.title: Chapter 1: A Mysterious Summons
001_ask_about_amulet.narr_text: "The amulet holds a fragment of my power. It will guide you through the forest and protect you from dark magic," Elwin explains.

002_darkwood_grove.title: Chapter 2: Darkwood Grove
002_darkwood_grove.narr_text: You reach Darkwood Grove, the air thick with an eerie silence. As you step into the grove, you hear a rustling in the bushes.

002_investigate_noise.title: Chapter 2: Darkwood Grove
002_investigate_noise.narr_text: You investigate the noise and find a wounded creature. It looks at you with pleading eyes, seeking help.

002_proceed_cautiously.title: Chapter 2: Darkwood Grove
002_proceed_cautiously.narr_text: You proceed cautiously through the grove, every shadow and sound putting you on edge. Suddenly, you feel a presence behind you.

002_help_creature.title: Chapter 2: Darkwood Grove
002_help_creature.narr_text: You help the wounded creature, using your healing magic. It transforms into a grateful forest spirit who promises to aid you in your quest.

002_ignore_creature.title: Chapter 2: Darkwood Grove
002_ignore_creature.narr_text: You decide to ignore the creature and continue your journey. As you move deeper into the grove, you can't shake the feeling that something is watching you.

002_turn_around.title: Chapter 2: Darkwood Grove
002_turn_around.narr_text: You turn around quickly and see a shadowy figure lurking in the trees. It steps forward, revealing itself to be a guardian of the grove.

002_draw_weapon.title: Chapter 2: Darkwood Grove
002_draw_weapon.narr_text: You draw your weapon and turn around, ready for any threat. A guardian of the grove stands before you, watching your every move.

002_speak_guardian.title: Chapter 2: Darkwood Grove
002_speak_guardian.narr_text: You speak to the guardian, explaining your mission. It listens intently, then offers to guide you safely through the grove.

002_prepare_battle.title: Chapter 2: Darkwood Grove
002_prepare_battle.narr_text: You prepare for battle, but the guardian raises a hand in peace. "I mean you no harm," it says. "Let us speak."

002_accept_guidance.title: Chapter 2: Darkwood Grove
002_accept_guidance.narr_text: You accept the guardian's guidance. Together, you navigate the dark paths of the grove, moving closer to your goal.

002_refuse_guidance.title: Chapter 2: Darkwood Grove
002_refuse_guidance.narr_text: You refuse the guardian's offer and continue alone. The path ahead is treacherous, and you feel the weight of your decision with every step.

002_continue_journey.title: Chapter 2: Darkwood Grove
002_continue_journey.narr_text: You continue your journey, with the forest spirit watching over you. You feel a renewed sense of purpose and determination.

health_is_zero.narr_text: A wave of dizziness washes over you. The world blurs and fades at the edges. Despite your best efforts (or perhaps due to a careless mistake), your body gives way. Everything goes dark
